headline: Geothermal Energy Industry Research Report 2025-2030 | Co-Production of Oil & Gas Wells, Harnessing Low-to-Medium Temperature Resources, and Decarbonization & Energy Security Drive Opportunities
summary: The geothermal energy market is projected to reach USD 13.56 billion by 2030, growing at a CAGR of 5.3%. Growth is fueled by the demand for renewable power generation, increased adoption of ground source heat pumps, and favorable government policies. The flash steam plants segment is expected to record the highest CAGR due to its developed technology and reduced CO2 emissions. Power generation remains the largest application, driven by the need for sustainable energy. North America is poised to

headline: Is It Too Late to Consider GE Vernova After Shares Soar 234%?
summary: If you are trying to figure out what to do with GE Vernova stock after its incredible run, you are not alone. Over the past year, shares have surged a remarkable 234%, grabbing the attention of both seasoned investors and curious newcomers. Such a rise does not happen in a vacuum. In GE Vernova’s case, it has been partly driven by renewed market interest in green energy and power infrastructure plays. Investors seem to be reevaluating the company’s future potential, willing to price in a...

headline: U.S. Transformers Industry Research Report 2025-2030 | GE Vernova, Eaton, and Siemens Energy Lead the Moderately Consolidated $1.49 Bn Market
summary: The U.S. transformer market is set to expand at a CAGR of 7.06% from 2024 to 2030, driven by digitalization and grid modernization. Innovations by companies like VIE Technologies, RESA Power, and Reinhausen Manufacturing highlight the adoption of AI and smart technologies. Utilities are upgrading infrastructure with IoT and DOE funding, tapping into the demand for renewables and EV support.
